ai-tika-s0402t11:1_0: A mendicant with faith and wisdom
ai-tika-s0402t11:1_1: Discerned as a mendicant Sāriputta and Moggallāna, taking the bowl of virtues that they have been wives in their special qualities of great qualities, Sāriputta and Moggallāna,” said the Elder Sāriputta and Moggallāna: “Did you cancel from your own special qualities of fewness of wishes, etc.
ai-tika-s0402t11:1_2: If he gets a further away, he would get a further support from that place.
ai-tika-s0402t11:1_3: For the Great virtues’ special qualities
ai-tika-s0402t11:1_4: Of those who know about the special qualities of quality, that is, when others reach the enlightenment factor.
ai-tika-s0402t11:1_5: Hence it is said: “Here there is no matter for him.”
ai-tika-s0402t11:1_6: The rest is the same as in the case.
ai-tika-s0402t11:2_1: When the five cords of sense desire comes to be broken as being taken and dragged down, he said, “He is enthusiastive,” etc., in this way, “They are milk-rice.”
ai-tika-s0402t11:2_2: But the streams have been destroyed.
ai-tika-s0402t11:2_4: Hence it is said: “There is no Virtue of quality, (thinking): “There is no offense for one who has taken on virtue”.
ai-tika-s0402t11:2_5: he says is “Hopefully happy”, “The meaning is this,” “There is the meaning of it,” and “There is the meaning of it,” and “There is.”
ai-tika-s0402t11:2_6: not having grasped, does not entertain and emerge from it.
ai-tika-s0402t11:2_7: And here the sixth offering to be direct-knowledge, and the sixth particular component.
